titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY NOT REFERRED FOR OPEN BIOPSY NO RESULT OR INADEQUATE RESULT TOTAL - Description

div.p: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY NOT REFERRED FOR OPEN BIOPSY NO RESULT OR INADEQUATE RESULT TOTAL is the total number of women with:
a BREAST SCREENING MAMMOGRAPHY OUTCOME CODE recorded as National Code 'Referred for assessment'

a REFERRAL REQUEST for PATHOLOGY INVESTIGATION TYPE FOR BREAST SCREENING recorded as National Code 'Needle
Biopsy
for Cytology (Fine Needle Aspiration or Cytology)' or 'Needle Biopsy
for Histology (Wide Bore Needle or Core Biopsy)' but NOT 'Diagnostic Surgery for Histology (Open Biopsy)'.
These women did not complete any or all procedures within 6 months of the date of the Breast Screening or had no final BREAST ASSESSMENT OUTCOME recorded.
